name: Dark/Night Choice of Games
description:
A dark/night theme for Choice of Games.

Feel free to tell me any suggestions, or let me know about any issues.

Enjoy!

user.name: cicerakes
user.about: No updates or responses here, check GitHub for latest updates! My styles aim to: - Darken the colours while keeping most, if not all, of the site's original design. - Optionally hide ads and other potentially unwanted features. - Sometimes both.

additional_info: This theme is for all the games and the main website, but not forums. Here's an Adfly link to Google you can click if you're feeling nice. Thanks! Changelog: 24/02/2017 + Fixed choice hover colour. + Fixed choice border colour. 14/03/2015 + First version.
